data.app_name: Football Goal Poacher VR: Header Simulator (Soccer)
data.description:
(CURRENTLY EARLY ACCESS) 

Become a pro football striker going up against challenging real-life defenders and goalkeepers to score header goals. 

# REAL-LIFE GOAL SCORING SCENARIO
We put together over 50 levels inspired by real-life goals that will test your header skills. 
{502323015590182}
![{"height":935,"type":"image","width":1671}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/227815876_1586323768814851_5411115242033859788_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bGz3hA4Et8AQ7kNvgEC9Aij&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9P5BJn92dPvkGirUuYhLD6eqYaGzw1lHANANK20fw2g&oe=66A220A0)

# CHALLENGING DEFENDERS AI

![{"height":787,"type":"image","width":1400}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75245816_761851356111897_3850337963444926132_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=onz2s0NqXdwQ7kNvgHwmns-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvDFSk-dehq1zIwO2axwJiUUs-vSJGPacMQE7mn7hpvg&oe=66A23CDB)
The defenders and goalkeepers in this game will try their best to stop you from scoring. You have to quickly assert their positions and decide where to put the ball to maximize scoring chance (as in real life).

# REALISTIC BALL HEADING PHYSICS
We developed our projectile physics to correctly simulate the ball projectile with drag, Magnus effect, and collision check with your head to ensure a realistic heading experience.

![{"height":774,"type":"image","width":1401}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982517_384127807502181_3051717530171403133_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9yuiaGEKi5cQ7kNvgGI9Tvp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCTHHMMvbSy0MaQcYA5ykd68RFCVbKRcA6xiJZyWO-eTw&oe=66A22814)

# REALISTIC GOAL-NET PHYSICS

![{"height":976,"type":"image","width":1856}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035338_3587114331599169_835525116529152714_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PuZCAVRG8LYQ7kNvgH12VH9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCeVNXTTMkelGC_zzcrI6yhQOW686LuqNhRUZJu-890GA&oe=66A233D4)

The game is in Early Access and we would love to hear your feedback! Join us on Discord now https://discord.gg/Xyp2SyyKXv

changelog.change_log:
Reduce stuttering during gameplay
Reduce shader + model complexity
Add SFX + haptic to UI
Add skip mandatory handlift at starting level
Other minor bug fixes
